category_items.section_description:
We are qualified architectural technologists. We provide multidisciplinary BIM documentation. In short, we are breaking down and analysing the design concept and work out how the building is buildable and functional to perform overtime for the building life circle in alignment with client expectation and design brief. 

* Mix Used Residential Development (Apartments + Retail)
* High-end architectural House (over two million NZD)
* School 
* Hospitality
* Factory and Warehouse
* Swimming pool and Facilities

section_images.caption: Town House Development. Designed by Case Ornsby
Trent Street Townhouse Development. Designed by Case Ornsby

category_items.section_description:
At the project beginning, we can help our client to define clear EIR (Exchange Information Requirement). Review pre-BIM execution plan during tender stage and assist the the award lead appointed party in securing the BIM execution plan content and delivery milestones in alignment with client expectations and goals.

We are famillar with many different open or close BIM workflow. The particular service we can provide:

1. Model performance review and check
2. CDE Establishment
3. Model Coordinations on IPT Coordination Platform with BCF information exchange

With over 15 years of design experience across multidiscipline, we target and value our projects from design creativity, energy efficiency and low maintenance.

Current Implementation as below:

Mix-Use Residential Development

Residential Dwelling

Passive house design

Light commercial (Factory/Warehouse)

section_images.caption: Contemporary Residential Dwelling Castle Hill New Zealand

category_items.section_description:
IPT develops digital construction models to help constructors to solve critical on-site issues to eliminate onsite operation risk. IPT service covers site and services pipework set out, 3D shop drawings, and post-construction as-built model delivery.

Implementation:

Builder Layout Drawings

Shop Drawings (PWS, HYD, Electrical, etc)

Passive Fire Penetration Quantification Study 

Model Auditing and Review 

Services Clash Detection 

As-built model

section_images.caption: Metro Sport Facility (Photo Credit: By Ōtākaro Ltd)
Example of Pipework Modelling For Construction

category_items.section_description: We team up with the client and nominated survey team to provide 'H' BIM process applied to existing buildings, whether they are monuments or simple dwellings of the 1950s. It will bring huge value to the client by providing digital asset information to support future maintenance and operation.
